title: Lee Sin, Lissandra, Nidalee, Zed and Udyr are high skillcap champions.
body: You need 10+ IQ to play them correctly. Double digits baby.

replies.body:
Lee, Liss, Nid and Zed do need some 'skill' in terms of starting to play them but what I think is that all of the first 4, you don't need that much skill to do "fine" in...but then their potential for being 'OP' depends on how good the player is at them OR how used to them the player is..

You get something like a normal Lissandra who has medium skill at Lissandra...they do fine in lane and in team fights etc

Then you get a "good" Lissandra who reks everything...

Also, all first 4 of the above, I feel as if the better you are at them, the safer of a pick they are...

______________


Now Udyr though he's just a brainless piece of sht

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=a3LbzQGi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-09T13:33:45.875+0000)
>
> Lee, Liss, Nid and Zed do need some 'skill' in terms of starting to play them but what I think is that all of the first 4, you don't need that much skill to do "fine" in...but then their potential for being 'OP' depends on how good the player is at them OR how used to them the player is..
> 
> You get something like a normal Lissandra who has medium skill at Lissandra...they do fine in lane and in team fights etc
> 
> Then you get a "good" Lissandra who reks everything...
> 
> Also, all first 4 of the above, I feel as if the better you are at them, the safer of a pick they are...
> 
> ______________
> 
> 
> Now Udyr though he's just a brainless piece of sht

Nope, all of them take no skill and are easy to play and bring way to much to the game.

Lissandra: Just gonna ult you and half your team for 60% of your health and you cant do %%%% about it.
Lee Sin: Gonna %%%% your jungler all game with my unlimited counterplay and mobility, tank like base stats and assassin like damage.
Udyr: QWEWREWRQEWREWREWRQEWRQERQW PENTA KILL!
Nidalee: Eat my 800 damage spears on a 3 second cool down (when more than half go invis) then I'll cougar form you and 100/0 you.
Zed: Just gonna go udyr mode for a sec then teleport back to my shadow because I'm a low risk high reward champion that instantly wins midlane.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=a3LbzQGi,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-10T03:54:33.471+0000)
>
> Nope, all of them take no skill and are easy to play and bring way to much to the game.
> 
> Lissandra: Just gonna ult you and half your team for 60% of your health and you cant do %%%% about it.
> Lee Sin: Gonna %%%% your jungler all game with my unlimited counterplay and mobility, tank like base stats and assassin like damage.
> Udyr: QWEWREWRQEWREWREWRQEWRQERQW PENTA KILL!
> Nidalee: Eat my 800 damage spears on a 3 second cool down (when more than half go invis) then I'll cougar form you and 100/0 you.
> Zed: Just gonna go udyr mode for a sec then teleport back to my shadow because I'm a low risk high reward champion that instantly wins midlane.

I must admit, Lissandra doesn't have many weak points at this stage...I mean, she's getting nerfs soon, it's on PBE if you're really that desperate for them
Lee Sin only has tank-like base stats and assassin-like damage early game...you don't abuse it then you'll fall of late (unless you're int he LCS or something)
Udyr's a shthead
Well getting 800 damage from spears is better than receiving around 1300~1500 from old Nidalee...
Zed can't always rely on his R to "escape"...so many people who aren't brain dead are beginning to wait for him to swap back...including me :D You should too :)
I was about to flame the sht out of you for being thick but then I remembered there's no such thing as counterplay and/or playing smart so I agree completely with everything you say.

> [{quoted}](name=SoloQ Warrior,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=a3LbzQGi,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-10T10:07:58.900+0000)
>
> I was about to flame the sht out of you for being thick but then I remembered there's no such thing as counterplay and/or playing smart so I agree completely with everything you say.

None of these champs have counterplay, they're cancer freelo.

Zed+Liss = Buy QSS or rely on teammates to chain CC and don't go spastic farm a side lane with no wards.
Lee = Do nothing but ward the sheep out of his jung and countergank only or drag the game to 30 mins then it becomes 4v5.
Udyr = Jungle pressure from Udyr is non-existent so push lanes and let your jungler invade without the threat of being roamed on.
Nidalee = Dodge her spears or stand behind minions like a normal human being.

Why are you even complaining about these champs when there's a piece of sht fish that goes invulnerable every 2s...
